attributes.action: hereby order Richard Wenger to give in and sign up to FACEBOOK!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: He's supposed to be an IT-savvy bloke, so why isn't Richard Wenger on Facebook? Think about how much better the Arsenal banter would be on here if the superfan was a member! Next time you see him, bug him about joining up!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
